channel.title: Horizon on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Horizon on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Kevin Costner’s ‘Horizon’ Settles Lawsuit Over Unpaid Costume Fees Amid Financial, Legal Woes
item.description: The production has also been sued for alleged breaches to a co-financing deal with distributor New Line Cinemas and by a stunt performer over an unscripted rape scene.
